primary_treatments.name: TH
primary_treatments.reasoning: Standard adjuvant regimen for small, node-negative Stage I HER2-positive breast cancer.

follow_up: History and physical examination every 6–12 months for 5 years.
Echocardiogram every 3 months during trastuzumab therapy.
contraindications: Avoid anthracyclines in patients with cardiac dysfunction.
Avoid paclitaxel in severe peripheral neuropathy.

treatment.name: Olaparib
treatment.reasoning: Consider only if high-risk features are present despite Stage I disease.

contraindications: Avoid anthracyclines in low ejection fraction.
